name: extract buffer data L1-L3
extract buffer data sum
extract buffer data statics
func:
let frequency = msg.payload.buffer.readFloatBE(0,4) // 71,72

let ampHourSinceLastReset = msg.payload.buffer.readFloatBE(24,4) // 83,84
let totalSystemPowerDemand = msg.payload.buffer.readFloatBE(28,4) // 85,86
let maxTotalSystemPowerDemand = msg.payload.buffer.readFloatBE(32,4) // 87,88

return { 
    payload: {
       frequency: frequency,
       ampHourSinceLastReset: ampHourSinceLastReset,
       ampHourSinceLastResetKilo: ampHourSinceLastReset / 1000.0,
       totalSystemPowerDemand: totalSystemPowerDemand,
       totalSystemPowerDemandKilo: totalSystemPowerDemand / 1000.0,
       maxTotalSystemPowerDemand: maxTotalSystemPowerDemand,
       maxTotalSystemPowerDemandKilo: maxTotalSystemPowerDemand / 1000.0
    }
}
